PresentationPage.title: Only one password to memorize
PresentationPage.description: Keep your passwords safe in your Cozy
PresentationPage.item1: Your passwords will be saved once and for all in your 100% personal and secured safe.
PresentationPage.item2: Your Cozy will log you in to your brands websites when you are browsing.
PresentationPage.item3: You will be able to connect your brands to your Cozy easily to get your data.

SecurityPage.title: Only one password to memorize
SecurityPage.description: The password of your Cozy becomes the unique key to decrypt your securely stored passwords

advices.memorize: **Memorize it well:** In case of loss, you will not be able to recover the encrypted passwords in your cozy.
